ygData.subject: Re: Test of Truth:  No Venom Sacks!
ygData.msgSnippet: also, check the venders.  people love to sell them cause they are worth a decent amount. ... From: Rodney Miller [mailto:RMiller@sageus.com] Sent: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
also, check the venders. people love to sell them cause they are worth
a decent amount.

-----Original Message-----
From: Rodney Miller [mailto:RMiller@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 7:30 AM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Test of Truth: No Venom Sacks!


From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>

They are just rare. I have found them on the tarantulas a number of
times..you may just have to auction and see if someone has gotten one
that
day.

Grod

-----Original Message-----
From: David [mailto:dnolle@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 29, 1999 11:57 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Test of Truth: No Venom Sacks!


From: David <dnolle@...>

Hello,
I've killed over 10 Desert Tarantulas but haven't found the Venom Sacks
I
need to get my "Token of Courage" for the Test of Truth Quest. Am I
doing
something wrong?

Pendor Paldan of the 6th Level
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
David A. Nolle
dnolle@...
